entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is on a broomstick and fighting against Death Eaters. ("Craning his neck, Harry saw it expand into being in midair.")

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A person who is riding a bike with an exhaust pipe that can create objects. ("Hagrid leaned low over the handlebars and sped up.")

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of people who are fighting against Harry and Hagrid. ("Three of the Death Eaters swerved and avoided it...")

relationships.description: Harry is fighting against the Death Eaters. ("More Killing Curses ﬂew past Harry’s head from the two remaining Death Eaters’ wands...")
Hagrid is also fighting against the Death Eaters. ("More Killing Curses ﬂew past Harry’s head from the two remaining Death Eaters’ wands...")
Harry and Hagrid are allies in this fight. ("Here we go again, Harry, hold on!" yelled Hagrid...)
